mapper.sql: costId, costName, baseDuration, baseCost, unitCost, status, des, creatTime, startTime, costType
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM cost
ORDER By baseDuration
ORDER By baseCost
mapper.insert: insert into cost (costName, baseDuration, baseCost, unitCost, status, des, creatTime, startTime, costType) values (#{costname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseduration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{basecost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unitcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creattime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{costtype,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update cost
costName = #{costname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baseDuration = #{baseduration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
baseCost = #{basecost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
unitCost = #{unitcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=DATE},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
costType = #{costtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
where costId = #{costId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
